alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued October 18 at 3:13AM EDT until October 18 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected. * WHERE...Huron County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS... Mainly shoreline and beach erosion due to onshore wind and waves but also high water possibly reaching low lying roads and property along the lakeshore. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Northwest winds gusting over 40 MPH at times will persist along the Lake Huron shoreline today. This will sustain high waves and lake levels along the lakeshore, especially from Caseville to Port Hope.
info.instruction: Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to protect property from rising water levels.
